text:
Have a couple posts in the Community looking for freelancers
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/HubSpot-Email-Template/m-p/407368|Email templates>

I am looking for a problem-solving designer who can help give our customers (K-12 schools and districts in North America) an immersive experience on a new microsite for K-12 educators.  If you have done parallax websites on HS (open to any innovative ideas), please send me a note.

I’m looking for some exciting talent to join my team at *Webstacks.* We are an Elite HubSpot Partner and are looking for driven individuals for a number of HubSpot roles:

– <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2404842043/|Marketing Technologist >
– <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2401961598/|Frontend Developer>

If you are interested, or know anyone who is interested please reach out to me via DM – I’d be excited to learn more.
